name: The Best Empliar
description:
This is a choose your own adventure style visual novel! This games was made to participate in the GMTK global game jam in which the theme was "Out of Control".

The idea behind this game is making sure your lies make sense, and it you have to lie to cover another lie, make sure that it doesn't contradict something that you have said before. Don't let your lies get out of control!

Germán Ricardo Morales -- Coding and Writing

Ana Mojica -- Character Art and Writing

Jimena Vargas -- Background Art and Idea
